meanings.definition: Having the tangy flavor or odor of game meat.
meanings.sent1: The stew tasted gamier after adding the venison.
meanings.sent2: The rabbit stew became gamier with each passing hour.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the soup was so gamier, it might as well have been a forest in a bowl.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the dish filled the room, gamier than any other meal she had ever cooked.
meanings.sent5: The gamier scent of the roast made her mouth water in anticipation.

meanings.definition: More intense or extreme in flavor or odor.
meanings.sent1: The blue cheese became even gamier as it aged.
meanings.sent2: The spices made the curry gamier than she had expected.
meanings.sent3: The room was filled with the gamier smell of burnt popcorn.
meanings.sent4: His cologne was gamier than anything she had ever smelled before.
meanings.sent5: The gamier taste of the wine lingered on her palate long after she had finished her glass.
